name: Pizza Spaceship
description:
Blast through a cartoon adventure filled with a healthy balance of fruit and vegetables, proving the superiority of pizza forever!
Boasts a fun tiny soundtrack by Braden Purcell.

Controls:
Shoot: Mouse 1/Spacebar
Aim: Mouse/Arrow Keys
Move: WASD
Powerup: Left Shift
Pause: Left Control
Close Game: Escape (while paused)
